Export.Routine:
WWWFORM31S(YINHALT,YLFDAT)
#define LogR(%1,%2) ; #define LogRx(%1) ; #define LogRm(%1) ; #;define LogR(%1,%2) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))= %1_"^WWWFORM31S("_%2_") : "_$zh $$$JournalOn #;define LogRx(%1) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn #;define LogRm(%1) $$$JournalOff m ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; SPEICHERN Ã„NDERUNGEN IN BEARBEITUNGSTABELLE ; ; Called By: WWWFORMF, WWWFORM31 as js Event return values ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : YRETVAL (several exits) ; ; ; History : ; 07-Jan-2011 GRF SR17579: Use explicit tag for WWWTR calls ; 03-Jan-2007 GRF Doco; quits ; 03.02.2004 FIS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YBBN,YDATEI,YDATEI1,YERR,YFELD,YFIELDNAME,YHTML,YINHALT1,YKEY,YKILL,YLFN new YNEW,YOK,YOLD,YRETVAL,YROW,YTEXT,YYFELD,YYLFDAT
set YRETVAL="" set YERR=0 set YLFDAT=$get(YLFDAT)
$$$LogR("",YINHALT_"<"_YLFDAT)
;FOCUS VERSCHIEBEN ;defer ;--------------------------------------- if YINHALT="MOVE" do quit YRETVAL . set YMAX = $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DIMENSION",1)) . set YRICHT = $extract(YLFDAT,1,2) . set YROW = $piece($extract(YLFDAT,6,99),"_",1) . set YCOL = $piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) . ; . if YRICHT="37" do ; LEFT . . for set YCOL=YCOL-1 quit:YCOL<1 quit:$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE","Y"_YROW_"_"_YCOL)) . ; . if YRICHT="38" do ; UP . . for set YROW=YROW-1 quit:YROW<1 quit:$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE","Y"_YROW_"_"_YCOL))&&('$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW))) . ; . if YRICHT="39" do ; RIGHT . . for set YCOL=YCOL+1 quit:YCOL>$piece(YMAX,"_",3) quit:$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE","Y"_YROW_"_"_YCOL)) . ; . if YRICHT="40" do ; DOWN . . for set YROW=YROW+1 quit:YROW>$piece(YMAX,"_",1) quit:$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE","Y"_YROW_"_"_YCOL))&&('$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW))) . ; . if YRICHT="33" do ; QUICK UP . . set YROW=YROW-10 . . for quit:YROW<1 quit:$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE","Y"_YROW_"_"_YCOL))&&('$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW))) set YROW=YROW-1 . ; . if YRICHT="34" do ; QUICK DOWN . . set YROW=YROW+10 . . for quit:YROW>$piece(YMAX,"_",1) quit:$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE","Y"_YROW_"_"_YCOL))&&('$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW))) set YROW=YROW+1 . ; . if YRICHT="35" set YCOL=$piece(YMAX,"_",3) ; FIRST COLUMN . if YRICHT="36" set YCOL=0 do ; PAGE DOWN . . for set YCOL=YCOL+1 quit:YCOL>$piece(YMAX,"_",3) quit:$data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE","Y"_YROW_"_"_YCOL)) . ; . if YROW<1 set YROW = 1 . if YROW>$piece(YMAX,"_",1) set YROW = $piece(YMAX,"_",1) . if YCOL<1 set YCOL = $piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) ; OLD POSITION . if YCOL>$piece(YMAX,"_",3) set YCOL = $piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) ; OLD POSITION . set YRETVAL="tdY"_YROW_"_"_YCOL
;FOCUS NEUANLEGE VERSCHIEBEN ;defer ;--------------------------------------- if YINHALT="MOVEKEY" do quit YRETVAL . set YDATEI=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) . if YDATEI="" quit . set YMAXKEY = $order(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) ;LETZTER KEY ;last KEY .set YRICHT = $extract(YLFDAT,1,2) .set YROW = $piece($piece(YLFDAT,"key",2),"_",1) .set YCOL = $piece($piece(YLFDAT,"key",2),"_",2) . if YRICHT="37" set YCOL=YCOL-1 ; LEFT . if YRICHT="39" set YCOL=YCOL+1 ; RIGHT . if YCOL<1 set YCOL=1 . if YCOL>YMAXKEY set YCOL=YMAXKEY . set YRETVAL="key"_YROW_"_"_YCOL
;TABULATER -> VOR ODER NEUANLAGE ;pre- Or ;--------------------------------------- if YINHALT="TABKEY" do quit YRETVAL . set YMAX=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DIMENSION",1)) . set YROW=$piece($extract(YLFDAT,4,99),"_",1) . set YCOL=$piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) . do . . if YROW=$piece(YMAX,"_",1) if YCOL=$piece(YMAX,"_",3) set YRETVAL=45 quit ;NEUANLAGE . . if YCOL=$piece(YMAX,"_",3) set YRETVAL=99 quit ;ANFANG NEUE ZEILE ;outset . . set YRETVAL=39
;NEUEN DATENSATZ SPEICHERN ;data record Save ;--------------------------------------- if YINHALT="SAVENEWLINE" do quit YRETVAL . new YMAX,KEY,YERR . set YMAX = $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DIMENSION",1)) . set YDATEI = $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) . quit:YDATEI="" . set YMAXKEY = $order(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) ;LETZTER KEY ;last KEY . set YLFN=1 . for YLFN(1)=1:1:(YMAXKEY-$piece(YMAX,"_",4)) set YLFN=YLFN+1 ;START BEI KEY ;take-off next to KEY . set YOLDKEY=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEKEY",$piece(YMAX,"_",1),1)) . set YNEWKEY="" . set YERR=0 . for YI=1:1:(YLFN-1) set YNEWKEY=""""_$translate($piece(YOLDKEY,",",YI),"""")_""""_"," . for YI=YLFN:1:YMAXKEY set KEY="add"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_(YI-YLFN+1) do . . if $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",KEY,1))="" set YERR=1 quit . . set YNEWKEY=YNEWKEY_""""_$translate($get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",KEY,1)),"""")_""""_"," . . kill ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",KEY) . . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" document.getElementById("_""""_"key"_$extract(KEY,4,99)_""""_").style.backgroundColor="_""""_"silver"_""""_";" . . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" document."_YHTMFORM_"."_KEY_".style.backgroundColor="_""""_"silver"_""""_";" . . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" document."_YHTMFORM_"."_KEY_".readOnly="_""""_"true"_""""_";" . . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" document."_YHTMFORM_"."_KEY_".unselectable="_""""_"true"_""""_";" . ; . if $extract($reverse(YNEWKEY))="," set YNEWKEY=$reverse($extract($reverse(YNEWKEY),2,999)) . if ($translate(YNEWKEY,",")="") || (YERR=1) set YRETVAL="#FUNCTION~"_"alert("_""""_$$^WWWTEXT(391,,1)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32292,,1)_""""_"); yaddline=2;" quit ;DATENSATZ BEREITS ANGELEGT . set YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("_""""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_""""_","_YNEWKEY_",1)" . if $get(@YDATEI1)'="" set YRETVAL="#FUNCTION~"_"alert("_""""_$$^WWWTEXT(3188,,1)_""""_"); yaddline=2;" quit ;DATENSATZ BEREITS ANGELEGT . do . . new YFORM,YVOR,YOK,YEXEC . . set YFORM=YDATEI ;WEGEN PROTOKOLL;FIS;09.02.05 . . set YOK=$$^WWWSPEI(YDATEI,YNEWKEY,"",1) ;SAVE . ; . set YNEWFOCUS=$order(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","Y1_")) . if YNEWFOCUS'="" set YNEWFOCUS="tdY"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_$piece(YNEWFOCUS,"_",2) . if YNEWFOCUS'="" set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" moveFocus("_""""_YNEWFOCUS_""""_",1,"_""""_""""_",1);" . if YNEWFOCUS'="" set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" updateRecord("_""""_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_""""_");" . set $piece(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DIMENSION",1),"_",1)=($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1) . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEKEY",($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1),1)=YNEWKEY . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","NEWRECORD",($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1),1)=YNEWKEY . set YLFDAT="Y1_" . for set YLFDAT=$order(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT)) quit:YLFDAT="" quit:$piece($piece(YLFDAT,"_",1),"Y",2)'=1 do . . set YLFDAT1="Y"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_$piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT1,1)="" . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT1,2)="" . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE",YLFDAT1,1)="" . ; . if YRETVAL'="" set YRETVAL="#FUNCTION~"_YRETVAL
;ANLAGE NEUEN DATENSATZ ABBRECHEN ;layout data record Cancel ;--------------------------------------- if YINHALT="KILLNEWLINE" do quit YRETVAL . new YNEWFOCUS,YMAX,YI . set YMAX = $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DIMENSION",1)) . set YDATEI = $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) . if YDATEI="" quit . set YMAXKEY=$order(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) ;LETZTER KEY ;last KEY . set YLFN=1 . for YLFN(1)=1:1:(YMAXKEY-$piece(YMAX,"_",4)) set YLFN=YLFN+1 ;START BEI KEY ;take-off next to KEY . for YI=YLFN:1:YMAXKEY set KEY="add"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_(YI-YLFN+1) do . . kill ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",KEY) . ; . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_"#FUNCTION~"_"document.all.tablegrid.deleteRow("_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_");" . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" document.getElementById("_""""_"focusfield"_""""_").value="_""""_""""_";" . set YNEWFOCUS=$order(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","Y1_")) . if YNEWFOCUS'="" set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" moveFocus("_""""_"td"_YNEWFOCUS_""""_",1,"_""""_""""_",1);"
;NEUEN DATENSATZ ANLEGEN ;data record put onto ;--------------------------------------- if YINHALT="CREATE" do quit YRETVAL . new YDATEI,YMAXKEY,YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL,YBBN,YLFN,YTYP . set YMAX=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DIMENSION",1)) . ;SET $PIECE(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","DIMENSION",1),"_",1)=$PIECE(YMAX,"_",1)+1 . ; . set YDATEI=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) . if YDATEI="" quit . set YMAXKEY=$order(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) ;LETZTER KEY ;last KEY . set YLFN=1 . for YLFN(1)=1:1:(YMAXKEY-$piece(YMAX,"_",4)) set YLFN=YLFN+1 ;START BEI KEY ;take-off next to KEY . if YLFN'<YMAXKEY quit . set YHTML="" . set YHTML=YHTML_" newRow=document.all.tablegrid.insertRow("_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_");" . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ;PRIMÃ„RSCHLÃœSSEL . ;------------------------------------- . for YI=1:1:$piece(YMAX,"_",4) do . . set YTYP=$piece($get(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,(YLFN+YI-1),1)),Y,3) . . set YTEXT="" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_"<input name='add"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_YI_"' type=text maxlength=60" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" style='" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" border:none; padding-top:0; padding-bottom:0;" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" background-color:"_"lightgoldenrodyellow"_";" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" font-family:arial; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal;'" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" onmousedown='if (yaddline==1) moveFocus("_""""_"key"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_YI_""""_",1)'" . . set NEXT=YI+1 . . if YI=$piece(YMAX,"_",4) set NEXT=1 . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" onKeyDown='if (event.keyCode == 13 || event.keyCode == 9) {" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" moveFocus("_""""_"key"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_NEXT_""""_",1,1);" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" window.setTimeout("_""""_"document."_YHTMFORM_".add"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_NEXT_".focus()"_""""_",10);" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" window.event.returnValue=false; window.event.cancelBubble=true;" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" }'" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" onhelp="_""""_"javascript: window.event.returnValue = false; window.event.cancelBubble = true;"_"""" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" onFocus='select();'" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" onBlur='validateField("_""""_"add"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_YI_""""_",this.value,"_""""_YTYP_""""_","_""""_""""_");'" . . set YTEXT=YTEXT_" >" . . ; . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell=newRow.insertCell(-1);" . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.id="_""""_"key"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_YI_""""_";" . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.font="_""""_"10pt arial"_""""_";" . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.border="_""""_"1px outset"_""""_";" . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.backgroundColor="_""""_"lightgoldenrodyellow"_""""_";" . . set YHTML=YHTML_" var ytext="_""""_$$ESC^WWWENCODE(YTEXT)_""""_";" . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.innerHTML=unescape(ytext);" . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ;DATENFELDER . ;------------------------------------- . set YSEI="" . for set YSEI=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,$$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1),YSEI)) quit:YSEI="" do . . set YZEILE="" . . for set YZEILE=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,$$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1),YSEI,YZEILE)) quit:YZEILE="" do . . . set YSPL="" . . . for set YSPL=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,$$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1),YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL)) quit:YSPL="" do . . . . set YBBN="" . . . . for set YBBN=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,$$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1),YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL,YFORM,YBBN)) quit:YBBN="" do . . . . . new YTXT,YLFN,YTYP,REL,PARA,RELF,SUCH,YFIELDNAME,YLENGTH,YWIDTH,YCOLON,YCOLOFF,YVALIGN,YPADDING,YHEIGHT,YFONT,YFONTSIZE,YFOCUS . . . . . do PARA^WWWFORM31("D",YBBN) ;SET PARAMETER ;table-mat parameter . . . . . quit:$piece(YTXT,Y,2)=15 ;HIDDEN . . . . . set YFIELDNAME="tdY"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_YBBN . . . . . ; . . . . . set YTEXT="" . . . . . if $piece(YTXT,Y,23)=5 set YTEXT=YTEXT_"<input type="_""""_"hidden"_""""_" id="_""""_"read"_$extract(YFIELDNAME,3,99)_""""_" value="_""""_1_""""_">" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell=newRow.insertCell(-1);" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.id="_""""_YFIELDNAME_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.font="_""""_YFONTSIZE_"pt "_YFONT_" font-weight:normal;"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.border="_""""_"1px outset"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.backgroundColor="_""""_YCOLOFF_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.width="_""""_(YWIDTH+4)_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.height="_""""_(YHEIGHT+4)_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.marginTop="_""""_"0pt"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.marginLeft="_""""_"0pt"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.marginBottom="_""""_"0pt"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.marginRight="_""""_"0pt"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.padding="_""""_"0"_""""_";" . . . . .;SET YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.paddingLeft="_""""_"2px"_""""_";" . . . . .;SET YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.paddingRight="_""""_"2px"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.backgroundColor="_""""_YCOLOFF_""""_";" . . . . . if (YTYP'=8) && (YTYP'=4) set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.textAlign="_""""_"left"_""""_";" . . . . . if (YTYP=8) || (YTYP=4) set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.style.textAlign="_""""_"right"_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" var ytext="_""""_$$ESC^WWWENCODE(YTEXT)_""""_";" . . . . . set YHTML=YHTML_" newCell.innerHTML=unescape(ytext);" . ; . set YHTML=YHTML_" moveFocus("_""""_"key"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_"1"_""""_",1);" . set YHTML=YHTML_" window.setTimeout("_""""_"document."_YHTMFORM_".add"_($piece(YMAX,"_",1)+1)_"_"_"1.focus()"_""""_",10);" . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_"#FUNCTION~"_YHTML
; ;Ã„NDERUNGEN RÃœCKGÃ„NGIG MACHEN ;making ;---------------------------- if YINHALT="UNDO" do quit YRETVAL . new YCHANGE . set YCHANGE="" . set YDATEI=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) . quit:YDATEI="" . set YROW="" . for set YROW=$order(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEKEY",YROW)) quit:YROW="" do . . set YKEY=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEKEY",YROW,1)) . . set YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("_""""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_""""_","_$$^WWWKEYBUILD(YKEY)_",1)" . . ;IF '$DATA(YDATEI1) QUIT . . set YFELD=$get(@YDATEI1) . . set YYFELD=YFELD . . ; . . set YLFDAT="Y"_YROW_"_" . . for set YLFDAT=$order(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT)) quit:YLFDAT="" quit:$piece($piece(YLFDAT,"_",1),"Y",2)'=YROW do . . . set YNEW=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT,1)) ;AKTUELLER INHALT ;purport . . . set YOLD=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT,2)) ;URSPRÃœNGLICHER INHALT ;purport . . . if $data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW)) set YNEW="######" . . . if $data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","NEWRECORD",YROW)) set YNEW="######" . . . if YNEW=YOLD quit ;KEINE Ã„NDERUNG ;no alteration . . . set YBBN=$piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) . . . set YLFN=$piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,+YBBN,1)),Y,1) . . . quit:+YLFN=0 . . . set YTYP=$piece($get(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)),Y,3) . . . set YTEXT=$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(YTYP,YOLD) . . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE",YLFDAT,1)=YTEXT ;SPEICHERN ANZEIGEFORMAT ;Save . . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT,1)=YOLD ;SPEICHERN INHALT ;Save purport . . . if $piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN)=YOLD quit ;KEINE Ã„NDERUNG ;no alteration . . . set $piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN)=YOLD . . ; . . if YFELD'=YYFELD do . . . ;IF '$DATA(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","NEWRECORD",YROW)) DO . . . do . . . . new YFORM,YVOR,YOK . . . . set YFORM=YDATEI ;WEGEN PROTOKOLL;FIS;09.02.05 . . . . set YOK=$$^WWWSPEI(YDATEI,YKEY,YFELD,1) . . . ; . . . ;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv Disabled block start . . . ;IF $DATA(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V","NEWRECORD",YROW)) DO . . . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW)=1 . . . . new YFORM,YVOR,YOK . . . . set YFORM=YDATEI ;WEGEN PROTOKOLL;FIS;09.02.05 . . . . do ^WWWKILL(YDATEI,YKEY) . . . ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Disabled block end . . . set YCHANGE=YCHANGE_" updateRecord("_""""_YROW_""""_");" . . . kill ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW) . ; . if YCHANGE'="" set YRETVAL="#FUNCTION~"_YCHANGE
;UPDATE ALLER FELDER ;------------------- if YINHALT="UPDATE" do quit YRETVAL . set YDATEI=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) . if YDATEI="" quit . if $get(YLFDAT)="" quit . ; . if +YLFDAT'=0 do quit ;UPDATE GANZE ZEILE . . set YROW=+YLFDAT . . set YKEY=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEKEY",+YROW,1)) . . if YKEY="" quit . . set YLFDAT="Y"_YROW_"_" . . for set YLFDAT=$order(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT)) quit:YLFDAT="" quit:$piece($piece(YLFDAT,"_",1),"Y",2)'=YROW do . . . set YBBN=$piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) . . . if +YBBN=0 quit . . . new YTXT,YLFN,YTYP,REL,PARA,RELF,SUCH,YFIELDNAME,YLENGTH,YWIDTH,YCOLON,YCOLOFF,YVALIGN,YPADDING,YHEIGHT,YFONT,YFONTSIZE . . . set YFIELDNAME=YLFDAT . . . do PARA^WWWFORM31("D",YBBN) . . . if +YLFN=0 quit . . . set YINHALT=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT,1)) ;AUS WWWDATEN HOLEN (SPEICHERFORMAT) ;out of send for . . . set YTEXT=$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(YTYP,YINHALT) . . . if YTYP=2 set YTEXT=+YTEXT ;FIS;31.08.04;26346 . . . if $data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW)) set YTEXT="######" . . . set YHTML=$$TEXT^WWWFORM31F() . . . if YHTML'="" do . . . . set YHTML=$$ESC^WWWENCODE(YHTML) . . . . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" inactivateField("_""""_YLFDAT_""""_","_""""_YHTML_""""_","_""""_YCOLOFF_""""_");" . . ; . . if YRETVAL'="" set YRETVAL="#FUNCTION~"_YRETVAL . ; . if +YLFDAT=0 do ;UPDATE NACH FELDÃ„NDERUNG ;within . . new YCOLOFFX . . set YROW=$extract($piece(YLFDAT,"_",1),2,999) . . if +YROW=0 quit . . set YKEY=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEKEY",YROW,1)) . . if YKEY="" quit . . set YHTML="" . . do . . . if $data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW)) quit . . . set YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("_""""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_""""_","_$$^WWWKEYBUILD(YKEY)_",1)" . . . if '$data(YDATEI1) quit . . . set YFELD=@YDATEI1 . . . set YYLFDAT=YLFDAT . . . set YLFDAT="Y"_YROW_"_" . . . for set YLFDAT=$order(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT)) quit:YLFDAT="" quit:$piece($piece(YLFDAT,"_",1),"Y",2)'=YROW do . . . . quit:YLFDAT=YYLFDAT . . . . set YINHALT=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT,1)) ;AKTUELLER INHALT ;purport . . . . set YBBN=$piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) . . . . if +YBBN=0 quit . . . . set YLFN=$piece($get(^WWW122(0,YFORM,YBBN,1)),Y,1) . . . . quit:+YLFN=0 . . . . if YINHALT=$piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN) quit ;KEINE Ã„NDERUNG ;no alteration . . . . ; . . . . new YTXT,YLFN,YTYP,REL,PARA,RELF,SUCH,YFIELDNAME,YLENGTH,YWIDTH,YCOLON,YCOLOFF,YVALIGN,YPADDING,YHEIGHT,YFONT,YFONTSIZE,YFOCUS . . . . set YFIELDNAME=YLFDAT . . . . do PARA^WWWFORM31("D",YBBN) . . . . set YTEXT=$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(YTYP,$piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN)) . . . . if YTYP=2 set YTEXT=+YTEXT ;FIS;31.08.04;26346 . . . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE",YLFDAT,1)=YTEXT ;SPEICHERN ANZEIGEFORMAT ;Save . . . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT,1)=$piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN) ;SPEICHERN INHALT ;Save purport . . . . ; . . . . set YHTML=$$TEXT^WWWFORM31F() . . . . ;SET YCOLLOFFX=YCOLLOFF . . . . set YCOLOFFX=YCOLOFF ;BEC;27422;02.03.05; . . ; . . if YHTML'="" do . . . set YHTML=$$ESC^WWWENCODE(YHTML) . . . set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" inactivateField("_""""_YLFDAT_""""_","_""""_YHTML_""""_","_""""_$get(YCOLOFFX)_""""_");" . . ; . . if YRETVAL'="" set YRETVAL="#FUNCTION~"_YRETVAL
; Save Changes ; Ã„NDERUNGEN SPEICHERN ;--------------------------------------- if YLFDAT'="" do . set YDATEI=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCECLASS",1)) . if YDATEI="" set YERR=1 quit . set YROW=$extract($piece(YLFDAT,"_",1),2,999) . if +YROW=0 set YERR=1 quit . set YKEY=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEKEY",YROW,1)) . if YKEY="" set YERR=1 quit . if $find(YKEY,",,") set YERR=1 quit . set YBBN=$piece(YLFDAT,"_",2) . if +YBBN=0 set YERR=1 quit . ; . new YTXT,YLFN,YTYP,REL,PARA,RELF,SUCH,YFIELDNAME,YLENGTH,YWIDTH,YCOLON,YCOLOFF,YVALIGN,YPADDING,YHEIGHT,YFONT,YFONTSIZE,YFOCUS . set YFIELDNAME=YLFDAT . do PARA^WWWFORM31("D",YBBN) . if +YLFN=0 set YERR=1 quit . ; . set YKILL=0 . if YINHALT="KILL" set YKILL=1 . if $data(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW)) set YKILL=2 ;BEREITS GELÃ–SCHT . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ; Save ;SPEICHERN . ;------------------------------------- . if YKILL=0 do . . set YINHALT=$get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YLFDAT,1)) ;AUS WWWDATEN HOLEN (SPEICHERFORMAT) ;out of send for . . set YTEXT=$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(YTYP,YINHALT) . . if YTYP=2 set YTEXT=+YTEXT ;FIS;31.08.04;26346 . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","REFERENCEVALUE",YLFDAT,1)=YTEXT ;SPEICHERN ANZEIGEFORMAT ;Save . . ; . . set YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("_""""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_""""_","_$$^WWWKEYBUILD(YKEY)_",1)" . . if '$data(YDATEI1) set YERR=1 quit . . set YFELD=@YDATEI1 . . if $piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN)=YINHALT quit ;KEINE Ã„NDERUNG ;no alteration . . set $piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN)=YINHALT . . do . . . new YFORM,YVOR,YOK,YEXEC . . . set YFORM=YDATEI ;WEGEN PROTOKOLL;FIS;09.02.05 . . . set YOK=$$^WWWSPEI(YDATEI,YKEY,YFELD,1) ;SAVE . . ; . . ;----------------------------------- . . ; *** EXECUTE *** $$$WWW120ExecuteOnAfterSaveData() . . ;----------------------------------- . . if $piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,16)'="" do ;EXECUTE AFTER SAVE ;BEC;25866;07.06.04;DA ZENTRALE DATEI . . . set YEXEC=$piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,16) ;BEC;25866;07.06.04;DA ZENTRALE DATEI . . . xecute YEXEC . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ; Delete ;LÃ–SCHEN . ;------------------------------------- . if YKILL=1 do . . set YDATEI1="^"_YDATEI_"("_""""_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI)_""""_","_$$^WWWKEYBUILD(YKEY)_",1)" . . if '$data(YDATEI1) set YERR=1 quit . . do . . . new YFORM,YVOR,YOK,YEXEC,YDATEI1 . . . set YFORM=YDATEI ;WEGEN PROTOKOLL;FIS;09.02.05 . . . do ^WWWKILL(YDATEI,YKEY) ;DELETE . . ; . . ;----------------------------------- . . ; *** EXECUTE *** $$$WWW120ExecuteAfterDataDeleted() . . ;----------------------------------- . . if $piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,17)'="" do ;EXECUTE AFTER DELETE . . . set YEXEC=$piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,17) . . . xecute YEXEC . . ; . . set YTEXT="" . . set ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,"V","KILLEDRECORD",YROW)=1 . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ; Killed Record ;BEREITS GELÃ–SCHT / Already Cleared . ;------------------------------------- . if YKILL=2 do . . set YTEXT="######" . ; . set YHTML=$$TEXT^WWWFORM31F() . ; . if YHTML'="" do . . set YHTML = $$ESC^WWWENCODE(YHTML) . . set YINHALT = $$ESC^WWWENCODE(YINHALT) . . set YRETVAL = "#FUNCTION~inactivateField("_""""_YLFDAT_""""_","_""""_YHTML_""""_","_""""_YCOLOFF_""""_",1);" . . if YKILL=1 set YRETVAL=YRETVAL_" deleteRow("_""""_YROW_""""_");"
if YERR'=0 set YRETVAL="!"_$$^WWWTEXT(391,,1)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32292,,1) ; "Not Saved! Check Please!" quit YRETVAL
